jp.deleteQuery: DELETE FROM Kanji WHERE characters = ? AND type = ?

en.insertQuery: INSERT INTO English (characters, english, type) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
en.deleteQuery: DELETE FROM English WHERE characters = ? AND type = ?

source.insertQuery: INSERT INTO Source (characters, source, type) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
source.deleteQuery: DELETE FROM Source WHERE characters = ? AND source = ?

notes.insertQuery: INSERT INTO Notes (characters, note, type) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
notes.deleteQuery: DELETE FROM Notes WHERE characters = ? AND type = ?

context_sentences.insertQuery: INSERT INTO Sentences (characters, en, jp) VALUES (?, ?, ?)

pitch_data.insertQuery: INSERT INTO PitchInfo (characters, reading, pitch) VALUES (?, ?, ?)

known_readings.insertQuery: INSERT INTO Readings (characters, reading, type) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
known_readings.deleteQuery: DELETE FROM Readings WHERE characters = ? AND type = ?
